text: Hudson Fernando Tobias de Carvalho (born 18 July 1986), simply known as Hudson, is a Brazilian footballer who plays for Imperatriz as a right back. ==External links== *Futebol de Goyaz profile * *Profile at iDNES.cz Category:1986 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Campeonato Brasileiro Série C players Category:Campeonato Brasileiro Série D players Category:Czech First League players Category:Clube Atlético Sorocaba players Category:Treze Futebol Clube players Category:Fortaleza Esporte Clube players Category:Centro Sportivo Alagoano players Category:Rio Claro Futebol Clube players Category:Bangu Atlético Clube players Category:América Futebol Clube (RN) players Category:Associação Portuguesa de Desportos players Category:Nõmme Kalju FC players Category:FC Slovan Liberec players Category:SK Dynamo České Budějovice players Category:Sociedade Imperatriz de Desportos players Category:Brazilian expatriate footballers Category:Brazilian expatriate sportspeople in Estonia Category:Brazilian expatriate sportspeople in the Czech Republic Category:Expatriate footballers in Estonia Category:Expatriate footballers in the Czech Republic
title: Hudson Fernando Tobias de Carvalho
